text: The Andromeda Nebula () is a 1967 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Yevgeni Sherstobitov.Гостья из будущего, или Посторонним вход воспрещенТУМАННОСТЬ АНДРОМЕДЫ It stars Sergei Stolyarov, Vija Artmane, and Nikolai Kryukov. == Actors == * Sergei Stolyarov as Dar Veter * Vija Artmane as Veda Kong * Nikolai Kryukov as Erg Noor * Tatyana Voloshina as Niza Krit * Lado Tskhvariashvili as Mven Mas == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 science fiction movies Category:Russian science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 31st century Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Sherstobitov
title: The Andromeda Nebula
